author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sirtex Medical Says HY ‍Profit Attributable $23.6 Million​
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Sirtex Medical Ltd:
* HY REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES DOWN 3.0 PERCENT TO $109.4 MILLION
* HY ‍PROFIT FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE UP 13.2% TO $23.6 MILLION​
* MAINTAINS PREVIOUS GUIDANCE OF REPORTED EBITDA BETWEEN $75-85 MILLION FOR THE FULL FINANCIAL YEAR‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
